summary: Creates a weapon that does X points of Fire Frost and Shock Damage
descriptionHtml:
This is the Progression Version of the Blade of Elements.

The Blade of Elements is a mod that adds a new weapon, the Elemental Blade. This version of the mod gives the weapon X points of Fire, Frost, and Shock damage (where X==1/5 total destruction skill) along with a swing speed of 1.5, as opposed to the normal 1. This version is different from the other two (Epic Version && Backfire Version) as for it increases in elemental damage, depending on your destruction skill. ex: 15 destruction == 3 Fire Frost and Shock damage, 100 destruction == 20 Fire Frost and Shock damage.

The weapon has unlimited charge.
The weapon can be found in Bleak Falls Barrow, lying on the table in the room with the Thu\'um word wall.
The weapon is based on a daedric sword. I do not retexture items, but if anyone who does would like to, let me know.


The Backfire version always does 10 points of Fire Frost and Shock damage, and has a chance of backfiring the effects, depending on your current destruction skill. (UPLOADED)

The Epic version always does 10 points of Fire Frost and Shock damage. There is no chance of backfire. (UPLOADED)
author: DeanCarter
